channel.title: minipainting on Peter's Notebook
channel.description: Recent content in minipainting on Peter's Notebook

item.title: Streaming / 2023-07-20
item.description: Soundtrack new Twitch.Player("twitch-embed", { video: "1877130621" }); I’m making an effort (for some values of “effort”) to line up my “evening painting” with 2000 UK Time and a camera. I’m doing the Twitch Streaming thing - I guess. Tonight I’m preparing this description along with the good old affiliate links! I’m planning to do the whole Balthasar Gold coat tonight. If that works out - I’d hope to get some of the washes done too.

item.title: WikiPete7 - Skelecron
One Day Brass NMM
item.description:
Months ago (April) I spent (a fraction of) a Saturday trying to develop a Non-Metallic Metal approach.

Bad things happened, so, I sat on the post for awhile … here it is now.
